title: Change Life Insurance Beneficiary
description: A policyholder recently got married and wants to change the beneficiary on their life insurance policy from their parent to their new spouse.

tasks.description: Authenticate the policyholder and retrieve their policy details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely identifies the policyholder and their active policy.

tasks.description: Collect the new beneficiary's full name, date of birth, and relationship to the insured.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new beneficiary's information.

tasks.description: Process the beneficiary change request and send a confirmation letter to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the beneficiary in the system and queues a confirmation letter.
